attributes.action: Stop car insurance cost being related to gender...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My Dad, who has been driving for 25+ years has not ever had an accident and is still paying more for his car insurance than my Mum, who has been driving for 20+ years and has not crashed either. This is not fair. 

If the stats show that more people of Chinese origin crash than any other ethnic group, should we raise the cost of insurance for the Chinese?  Of course not, as this would be racist, in exactly the same way as the current system is sexist.

How can we be a society that promotes equal opportunity to all when the cost of your car insurance is reflected by your gender? I have had 2 accidents and deserve to pay more than those that have not.  

Everyone should start on a flat rate regardless of gender and your fee then reflects YOUR driving habits and not those of your gender before you.
